dc_description_s: Shows a large portion of North America surrounding the Mississippi River Basin, including American Colonies and French and Spanish territorial possessions of Louisiana and Florida, and a small portion of Canada and Mexico; includes settlements and rivers. Title from ornamental cartouche. Measured east from unidentified meridian. "Edita à Io. Bapt. Homanno S. CM. Geographo, Norimbergæ." Relief shown pictorially. Includes ill cartouches: Catarrhacta ad Niagaram -- Ins. Gall. Societatis Indiæ Occidentalis. Includes key to symbols.
dc_publisher_s: [Amstelædami : Apud viduam ac filios Ioachimi Ottens, 1729?]
dc_subject_sm: Mississippi River Valley,Historical geography,Maps,Early works to 1800
dc_title_s: Amplissimæ regionis Mississipi seu provinciæ Ludovicianæ â R.P. Ludovico Hennepin, Francisc. Miss. in America Septentrionali anno 1687 detectæ : nunc Gallorum coloniis et actionum negotiis toto orbe celeberrimæ : nova tabula
